wargear.name: ironstorm missile pod
wargear.abilities: Indirect Fire. Blast. This weapon can target units that are not visible to the bearer.

wargear.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon against an AIRCRAFT unit, add 1 to that attackâ€™s hit roll.

wargear.name: thermal spear
wargear.abilities: Each time an attack made with this weapon targets a unit within half range, that attack has a damage characteristic of D6+2.

wargear.name: reaper chain-cleaver (Sweep)
wargear.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon profile, make 2 hit rolls instead of 1.

wargear.name: meltagun
wargear.abilities: Each time an attack made with this weapon targets a unit within half range, that attack has a damage characteristic of D6+2.

wargear.name: heavy flamer
wargear.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, that attack automatically hits the target.

wargear.name: thermal cannon
wargear.abilities: Each time an attack made with this weapon targets a unit within half range, that attack has a damage characteristic of D6+4.

wargear.name: rapid-fire battle cannon
wargear.abilities: Blast

wargear.name: las-impulsor (low-intensity)
wargear.abilities: Blast

wargear.name: las-impulsor (high-intensity)
wargear.abilities: Blast

wargear.name: plasma decimator (Standard)
wargear.abilities: Blast

wargear.name: plasma decimator (Supercharge)
wargear.abilities: Blast. Each time an unmodified hit roll of 1 is made for an attack with this weapon profile, the bearer suffers 2 mortal wounds after shooting with this weapon profile.

wargear.name: volcano lance
wargear.abilities: Blast

wargear.name: conflagration cannon
wargear.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, that attack automatically hits the target.

wargear.name: thundercoil harpoon
wargear.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon against an MONSTER or VEHICLE unit (excluding AIRCRAFT), add 1 to that attack's hit roll. Each time an attack made with this weapon is allocated to a model, that model's unit suffers 3 mortal wounds in addition to the normal damage.

wargear.name: shieldbreaker missile
wargear.abilities: Each time the bearer is selected to shoot, it can only make attacks with one shieldbreaker missile, and it can only shoot each shieldbreaker missile it is equipped with once per battle. Each time an attack is made with this weapon, invulnerable saving throws cannot be made against that attack.

wargear.name: twin siegebreaker cannon
wargear.abilities: Blast

wargear.name: twin meltagun
wargear.abilities: Each time an attack made with this weapon targets a unit within half range, that attack has a Damage characteristic of D6+2.

wargear.name: reaper chainsword (Sweep)
wargear.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon profile, make 3 hit rolls instead of 1.

wargear.name: thunderstrike gauntlet (Sweep)
wargear.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon profile, make 2 hit rolls instead of 1.

wargear.name: freedom's hand (Strike)
wargear.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon profile, an unmodified wound roll of 6 inflicts D3 mortal wounds on the target in addition to the normal damage.

wargear.name: freedom's hand (Sweep)
wargear.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon profile, make 2 hit rolls instead of 1 and an unmodified wound roll of 6 inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to the normal damage.

wargear.name: asterius volkite culverin
wargear.abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, an unmodified wound roll of 6 inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage.

wargear.name: karacnos mortar battery
wargear.abilities: Blast. Each time an attack is made with this weapon, a wound roll of 2+ is always successful, unless the target is a VEHICLE or TITANIC unit.
